level.heading: Transition.
level.text: For a period of 2 years following March 25, 1986, all references in this subchapter to supervision by licensed social workers shall be deemed to refer to supervision by persons meeting the requirements for licensure in the District, regardless of whether they are licensed in fact.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 6-99
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 6-99, see Historical and Statutory Notes following ยง 3-1201.01.
